comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: About your casino review which is only what I still checked for now, I can see two to three gambling sites that are on this forum there like Fairspin and Trustdice, but I did not see others like Livecasino.io, Stake, Rollbit, Roobet, Duelbit and many others. You can check the official thread of some other gambling sites on the gambling board of this forum which is also the board you post this topic. We have highly trustworthy casinos.

We have highly trustworthy casinos.Probably you only checked their home page. They have actually listed duelbits, livecasino, roobet, stake and others like fortunejack, sportsbet.io, winz.io and many more casinos that can also be seen oon this forum. Listed casinos can be seen on this page [1].Well, about the actual reviews and score system, i wonder if there is a transparency chart that can be seen, example of why you gave a 7 "score" for the "trust level" to a certain casino, why not 8 or 9? And to other criteria too.Edit: Okay I just found out the rating/score system[2]. [1] https://cryptogamble.tips/casino/[2] https://cryptogamble.tips/how-we-rate/

comments.author: HunnyFinance
comments.body: I saw your reviews and happened to watched your twitch. I would say you guys are doing a good job in reviewing crypto casinos, games, providers and their respective bonuses. Would you guys happen to have poker reviews as well?

Kind of confusing.

comments.author: theroyalgambler
comments.body: Thank you guys for your feedback, for me, it's very important. I will have a look at how we can make that easier to understand when it comes to finding all the crypto casinos reviewed. We are constantly looking for new crypto casinos to review. However, you might not find all of them as some get rejected because either is too much of a copy of other casinos (I agree a lot on the post here about copycats) or else because we think they won't bring any advantage or innovation for the players. Thank you @PX-Z for pointing that out. When I started the website I thought the same thing as you... how can a casino get x amount of stars or why a certain rating? Therefore the team came up with an easy and transparent way that we use to rate casinos. That rating system is public and anyone can check. However, we are still updating all the ratings as some casino reviews still need an update.  @Hunnyfinance we are still working on a sister brand, we will start advertising it when we finish. and thank you for joining the streams. My schedule for the stream is from Monday to Friday at 12.30 pm Italian Time feel free to join. I do random giveaways during the stream (today for example we are giving away 50$)

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: were you inspired by the game of GTA vice city? as soon as i saw this color combination i remembered the game of gta vice cityI have some questions:Have you followed each casino regarding cases of scam allegations? if a casino is accused of scam but you are able to make withdrawals what will you do? are you going to put a warning on your site or are you just going to wait for you to not be able to make withdrawals in order to put on your site that casino X is not paying?when a casino has problems with a customer, do you have a dispute section to call the casino and customer to resolve the problem?

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on November 04, 2022, 01:54:51 PMwere you inspired by the game of GTA vice city? as soon as i saw this color combination i remembered the game of gta vice cityI was going to ask the same question. The style and font of CryptoGamble logo is as same as GTA vice city logo.@theroyalgambler, I just checked the different pages and reviews of different casinos on your site. You have reviewed a lot of casinos, the website is well furnished as well. There is also a dedicated page for Blacklisted Casinos, but it contains only 3 casinos name. I liked one thing on the review page, you have given 'Recommended' tag on reputable casinos and 'New Casino' tag on some casinos. But you should update the 'New Casino' tag for some casinos as those have become old now.BTW, why the review of LuckyFish.io is still available on Cryptogamble.tips? LuckyFish has discontinued their services almost one year ago.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on November 04, 2022, 02:51:20 PMQuote from: Slow death on November 04, 2022, 01:54:51 PMwere you inspired by the game of GTA vice city? as soon as i saw this color combination i remembered the game of gta vice cityI was going to ask the same question. The style and font of CryptoGamble logo is as same as GTA vice city logo.I agree, this theme is 100 GTA, to be honest i like it.And the amount of information about gambling and crypto casinos is huge, i like the fact that they describe us what do we need to have our own casino.It would be nice to have the option to add new casinos to the engine, i guess we have to contact admin by mail for that, but isn't a big deal. +1 to OP for the nice site.

comments.author: theroyalgambler
comments.body: 1. First of all, thank you, seoincorporation, Mahdirakib, and Slow death, for taking the time to check out the website and asking valuable questions. All of the questions asked of these mentioned are the same ones we ask ourselves.2. If you want us to review any casino, please mention it in the thread - we look for new ones to add, plus we receive requests from casinos themselves.3. Regarding the Tags (new casinos and recommended), we are having an ongoing revamp of all the casino reviews, which will help us remove and update the tags, depending on the needs. Luckyfish is still there, as we kept the review for some time and then changed the tag to ''casino closed''. We kept it all this time because there was a possibility of them returning, but that never happened. 4. And, yes, you are right! The team was inspired by the GTA vice city. We wanted to differentiate ourselves by having a unique design, and GTA Vice City was a way to go since we are fans of the game. Also, it helped us get more recognition and brand awareness.5. All the casinos reviewed were analyzed by me. I have taken a look at the scam accusation and kept that in consideration when checking and doing an objective review. Ultimately, we serve the players and will continue to point out both flaws and the virtues of the crypto casinos we review. Additionally, to further prove the authenticity of the casino service checking, we have started a Twitch account, where the players get to participate in the casino's experience through our stream. The information we gather there ends up on the said casino's review page.6. At the moment, we are not looking to create something we cannot offer and that includes the dispute section. When we will have a bigger team we will reconsider this option.

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: Welcome! While a "competitor", I am happy to see you on Bitcointalk!  All the best to you - unlike many other sites, fellow bitcointalk people, this site can be recommended for solid crypto gambling information.

While a "competitor", I am happy to see you on Bitcointalk!  All the best to you - unlike many other sites, fellow bitcointalk people, this site can be recommended for solid crypto gambling information.It's a pleasure seeing your comment about our website from a well-known person in the community of BT. Thank you @efialtis, I can only wish the best for what you are building especially because I understand the value you are providing for people and, I am sure that everyone visiting your platform is doing better choices because of what you created. Looking forward to more feedback from anyone reading this thread.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. I have checked your site. It seems to be very much inspired by GTA Vice City. Your theme, layout, and font style are too much to resemble the GTA Vice City. However, could you please share the basis and source of the data you update on your website? I think sharing the complete details is mandatory so your site can be considered authentic.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Hi, welcome to the forum, i just visited the site and though not with the very best of designs and functionality, but it looks great considering you guys are still building.I was actually busy looking for the sign up button but couldn't locate any..Quote from: theroyalgambler on November 03, 2022, 07:43:41 AM⭐ -> Unique and Exclusive Bonuses How then do you manage to offer unique and exclusive bonuses to gamblers if there is no way to create account on the site?Because from my understanding of what exclusive and unique bonus means, it means it's a kind of bonus that is particularly available to a gambler and not available to other gamblers, maybe you would want to look into this.

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 23, 2022, 02:23:49 PMQuote from: theroyalgambler on November 03, 2022, 07:43:41 AM⭐ -> Unique and Exclusive Bonuses How then do you manage to offer unique and exclusive bonuses to gamblers if there is no way to create account on the site?Its not bonus from his site to us, but rather he directed the link of every casino's bonus like deposit bonus, and etc to us who like to sign up on casino site from his site. So we can choose which bonus we want from his site, instead go to every casino site then try to search whats their bonuses.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: janggernaut on November 23, 2022, 02:44:25 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 23, 2022, 02:23:49 PMQuote from: theroyalgambler on November 03, 2022, 07:43:41 AM⭐ -> Unique and Exclusive Bonuses How then do you manage to offer unique and exclusive bonuses to gamblers if there is no way to create account on the site?Its not bonus from his site to us, but rather he directed the link of every casino's bonus like deposit bonus, and etc to us who like to sign up on casino site from his site. So we can choose which bonus we want from his site, instead go to every casino site then try to search whats their bonuses. OK... Though your explanation isn't clear enough I think I understand, it's just like getting the direct link to the bonuses on every casino listed on his site, and putting that direct link to the bonus on his site for his visitors to access it easily rather than users going on the casino itself to search for this bonuses?If the above is what you mean and you are correct, well then, that's a good one, but I hope he makes this clearer for users to understand, some persons might misunderstand this and go searching the site for how to sign up to claim the bonus.Anyways, this is just my opinion.

Though your explanation isn't clear enough I think I understand, it's just like getting the direct link to the bonuses on every casino listed on his site, and putting that direct link to the bonus on his site for his visitors to access it easily rather than users going on the casino itself to search for this bonuses?If the above is what you mean and you are correct, well then, that's a good one, but I hope he makes this clearer for users to understand, some persons might misunderstand this and go searching the site for how to sign up to claim the bonus.Anyways, this is just my opinion. Just like on what you are seeing on guide or review sites which they are giving out their affiliate links or site url directly.This one do really just maintain or focus on bonus which is really great but majority of gamblers in the market that when it comes to bonuses and promotions, then its not something that you could really be that interested because of its terms and conditions.This is why its not really that much an interesting thing for most but its not really that a bad thing to have that kind of listing because there are some who are really thattoo lazy on activating bonuses because you do still need to search for it.Some do even think that it was automatic.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 23, 2022, 02:23:49 PMHi, welcome to the forum, i just visited the site and though not with the very best of designs and functionality, but it looks great considering you guys are still building.I was actually busy looking for the sign up button but couldn't locate any..Quote from: theroyalgambler on November 03, 2022, 07:43:41 AM⭐ -> Unique and Exclusive Bonuses How then do you manage to offer unique and exclusive bonuses to gamblers if there is no way to create account on the site?Because from my understanding of what exclusive and unique bonus means, it means it's a kind of bonus that is particularly available to a gambler and not available to other gamblers, maybe you would want to look into this. The designs are fine for me and in case you did not know, there is an option to change the theme in to dark. Just click on the orange circle button beside the search bar. I know its colour pink and will look girly to some guys but if you have played vice city game before, you will easily know that this site was inspired by it.There is no sign up button because this wasn't a casino but it was a review site. If you mean sign up button for the sites that they showcase, just click on the claim bonus and you will be redirected to that site. Before I forgot, id also like to welcome the OP. There were not many review sites in the forum so you can still be known here as long your reviews are honest.

Probably the site gives many options and introduces a gambling site that offers more bonuses and promotions, if its not an affiliate link then that could be good. There’s a lot of review site already and I’m looking for the edge of this site and wonder the fairness of the review. The site looks good though, maybe I’m just looking for a more critique and honest review.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on November 03, 2022, 10:34:30 AMNice, I have looked for it again, it is underneath on the website. If you clicked on the website at first, you will be able to see 'crypto gambling sites' which remain sticky while scrolling through or using the website, when I clicked on it, here is the result: https://cryptogamble.tips/crypto/. Kind of confusing.it is indeed kind of confusing. I have to check the site thoroughly before I can see the gambling sites that are here in the forum. I think that the gambling sites that are listed are mostly fiat casino that started to accept crypto as one of their mode of payments which I would say a hybrid casino which you can deposit either crypto or fiat that they accepted. I cannot say if I have known another review site that has another service on their site like tips, list of strategy or something related to gambling.
